restarter.start_timeout: Server nije uspio započeti na vrijeme
restarter.partial_hang_warn: Due to a partial hang, this server will restart in 1 minute. Please disconnect now.
restarter.partial_hang_warn_discord: Due to a partial hang, **%{servername}** will restart in 1 minute.
restarter.schedule_warn: Ovaj server je zakazan da se restarta za %{smart_count} minutu. Molim vas se isključitite. |||| Ovaj server ce se restartovati za %{smart_count} minuta.
restarter.schedule_warn_discord: **%{servername}** restarta se za %{smart_count} minutu. |||| **%{servername}** restarta se za %{smart_count} minuta.

ban_messages.kick_temporary: (%{author}) Zabranjen vam je pristup ovom serveru zbog "%{reason}". Vaša zabrana istječe za: %{expiration}.
ban_messages.kick_permanent: (%{author}) Zabranjen vam je pristup ovom serveru za uvjek zbog "%{reason}".

reject.title_permanent: You have been permanently banned from this server.
reject.title_temporary: You have been temporarily banned from this server.
reject.note_multiple_bans: Note: you have more than one active ban on your identifiers.
reject.note_diff_license: Note: the ban above was applied for another license, which means some of your IDs/HWIDs match the ones associated with that ban.

admin_only.insufficient_ids: You do not have discord or fivem identifiers, and at least one of them is required to validate if you are a txAdmin administrator.
admin_only.deny_message: Your identifiers are not assigned to any txAdmin administrator.

guild_member.mode_title: This server is in Discord Guild Member Whitelist mode.
guild_member.insufficient_ids: You do not have the discord identifier, which is required to validate if you have joined our Discord Guild. Please open the Discord Desktop app and try again (the Web app won't work).
guild_member.deny_title: You are required to join our Discord Guild to connect.
guild_member.deny_message: Please join the guild %{guildname} then try again.

guild_roles.mode_title: This server is in Discord Role Whitelist mode.
guild_roles.insufficient_ids: You do not have the discord identifier, which is required to validate if you have joined our Discord Guild. Please open the Discord Desktop app and try again (the Web app won't work).
guild_roles.deny_notmember_title: You are required to join our Discord Guild to connect.
guild_roles.deny_notmember_message: Please join %{guildname}, get one of the required roles, then try again.
guild_roles.deny_noroles_title: You do not have a whitelisted role required to join.
guild_roles.deny_noroles_message: To join this server you are required to have at least one of the whitelisted roles on the guild %{guildname}.

approved_license.mode_title: This server is in License Whitelist mode.
approved_license.insufficient_ids: You do not have the license identifier, which means the server has sv_lan enabled. If you are the server owner, you can disable it in the server.cfg file.
approved_license.deny_title: You are not whitelisted to join this server.

nui_warning.title: WARNING
nui_warning.stale_message: Ovo upozorenje je izdato prije nego što ste se povezali na server.
nui_warning.instruction: držite %{key} %{smart_count} sekundu da vam se skine ova poruka. |||| držite %{key} %{smart_count} sekundi da vam se skine ova poruka.

misc.help_message:
txAdmin Menu enabled, type /tx to open it.
You can also configure a keybind at [Game Settings > Key Bindings > FiveM > Menu: Open Main Page].
misc.menu_not_admin:
Your identifiers do not match any admin registered on txAdmin.
If you are registered on txAdmin, go to Admin Manager and make sure your identifiers are saved.
misc.menu_auth_failed: txAdmin Menu authentication failed with reason: %{reason}
misc.no_perms: You do not have this permission.
misc.not_enabled: The txAdmin Menu is not enabled! You can enable it in the txAdmin settings page.
misc.dialog_empty_input: You cannot have an empty input.
misc.onesync_error: This action requires OneSync to be enabled.

frozen.was_frozen: You have been frozen by a server admin!

tooltips.tooltip_1: Use %{key} to switch pages & the arrow keys to navigate menu items
tooltips.tooltip_2: Certain menu items have sub options which can be selected using the left & right arrow keys

superjump.title: Super Jump
superjump.label: Toggle super jump mode, the player will also run faster

coords.title: Coords
coords.label: Go to specified coords
coords.dialog_desc: Provide coordinates in an x, y, z format to go through the wormhole.
coords.dialog_error: Invalid coordinates. Must be in the format of: 111, 222, 33

back.title: Back
back.label: Go back to last location
back.error: You don't have a last location to go back to!

vehicle.title: Vehicle
vehicle.not_in_veh_error: You are not currently in a vehicle!

spawn.title: Spawn
spawn.label: Spawn vehicle by model name
spawn.dialog_desc: Enter in the model name of the vehicle you want to spawn.
spawn.dialog_error: The vehicle model name '%{modelName}' does not exist!

boost.title: Boost
boost.label: Boost the car to achieve max fun (and maybe speed)
boost.unsupported_class: This vehicle class is not supported.
boost.redm_not_mounted: You can only boost when mounted on a horse.

myself.title: Myself
myself.label: Restores your health
myself.success_1: You should be feeling good now!

announcement.title: Send Announcement
announcement.label: Send an announcement to all online players.
announcement.dialog_desc: Send an announcement to all online players.

clear_area.title: Reset World Area
clear_area.label: Reset a specified world area to its default state
clear_area.dialog_desc: Please enter the radius where you wish to reset entities in (0-300). This will not clear entities spawned server side.

player_ids.title: Toggle Player IDs
player_ids.label: Toggle showing player IDs (and other info) above the head of all nearby players

misc.error: An error occurred fetching this users details. The error is shown below:
misc.target_not_found: Was unable to find an online player with ID or a username of %{target}

dm_dialog.title: Direct Message
dm_dialog.description: What is the reason for direct messaging this player?

warn_dialog.title: Warn
warn_dialog.description: What is the reason for direct warning this player?

kick_dialog.title: Kick
kick_dialog.description: What is the reason for kicking this player?

notifications.spectate_failed: Failed to resolve the target! Exiting spectate.
notifications.spectate_cycle_failed: There are no players to cycle to.
